Interface Space

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlankSpace, FairTPot, Hold, HoldQ, JStack, PHold, RandTPot
public interface Space

Spaces are parts of the board at specific indecies.

Method Summary
abstract  boolean advanced()
          Check if the last turn advanced a token.
abstract  boolean canMove(Token t, int roll, int boardEnd)
          Check if the given token can move.
abstract  String getStatus()
          Return the type and vital information of the space.
abstract  void land(Token t, Die d)
          Land token on space.
abstract  boolean takeTurn(Token t, int r, int boardEnd)
          Take the turn of the token t.
 

Method Detail

advanced

boolean advanced()
Check if the last turn advanced a token.

Returns:
if token advanced.

canMove

boolean canMove(Token t,
                int roll,
                int boardEnd)
Check if the given token can move.

Parameters:
t - the token that will move.
roll - roll that will move the token.
boardEnd - the index of the final space on the board.
Returns:
if token can move.

getStatus

String getStatus()
Return the type and vital information of the space.

Returns:
the type and vital information of the space.

land

void land(Token t,
          Die d)
Land token on space. Executes appropriate operations for when a token lands on the space.

Parameters:
t - token that is landing on this space.
d - die that is used for the game.

takeTurn

boolean takeTurn(Token t,
                 int r,
                 int boardEnd)
Take the turn of the token t. Executes appropriate operations for the token to take its turn.

Parameters:
t - token that is taking its turn.
r - die roll for the turn.
boardEnd - the index of the final space on the board.
Returns:
if the game has ended.
